item.title: Aon Hewitt has recognized DBS as one of the top 25 companies in the world for leadership
item.description: DBS Bank has been acknowledged by Aon Hewitt as one of the top 25 global companies for nurturing leaders. In Aon Hewitt’s 2014 ranking, DBS secured the 18th position, making it the highest-ranking Singapore-based organization on the list. Furthermore, DBS was recognized as a leader in Southeast Asia in the 2014 Aon Hewitt Top Companies for Leaders. Lee Yan Hong, Managing Director of DBS Group Human Resources, emphasized DBS’s commitment to developing future leaders.
